title: Gantz Origins: Oku Hiroya And Sf Movie Stories
alternative_title: Gantz no Moto ; Gantz no So ; Gantz no Moto: Oku Hiroya to SF Eiga Monogatari
status: Gantz no Moto ; Gantz no So ; Gantz no Moto: Oku Hiroya to SF Eiga Monogatari
description:
Description :
        Short stories showing some of Oku Hiroya's inspirations before he created his famous masterpiece, Gantz. From Baka-Updates: This series tells us stories about the mangaka's (OKU Hiroya) favorite movies and how it helped and lead to the creation of the manga we all came to know & love - Gantz.
